footer.description: Platform for the best dive sites and spots - EviDive

hero.title: Simple as can be
hero.titleAlt: Dive in total freedom with EviDive
hero.subtitle: Explore the most beautiful dive sites around the world. Book easily with certified dive centers and live an unforgettable adventure.
hero.seoTitle: EviDive - Book Your Dive Experiences Worldwide
hero.aboutTitle: Dive into the heart of the seabed with EviDive
hero.aboutSubtitle: Discover the best dive spots around the world thanks to our platform dedicated to underwater enthusiasts.
hero.aboutBody: With EviDive, easily book your next underwater adventures with certified dive centers, wherever you are. Curious beginner or confirmed diver, experience unforgettable moments in crystal-clear waters, among colorful reefs, mysterious wrecks and exceptional marine life.
hero.tagline: EviDive – Your portal to the depths of the world.
hero.heroVisible: The leading booking platform for diving worldwide

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.exploreDesc: Browse our interactive map and discover the most beautiful diving sites in the world.
howItWorks.bookDesc: Check real-time availability and book your dive with ease.
howItWorks.confirmDesc: Receive your confirmation instantly with all the details for an unforgettable experience.

whyUs.title: Why choose us?
whyUs.subtitle: Dive into the heart of the seabed with EviDive. Explore the best dive spots around the world thanks to our platform dedicated to underwater enthusiasts.
whyUs.certifiedDesc: Your safety is our absolute priority. We guarantee compliant equipment, professional supervision and safety protocols.
whyUs.bookSimpleDesc: Access real-time availability, transparent pricing, detailed activity descriptions and verified reviews from other divers.
whyUs.diversityDesc: Explore hundreds of dive sites around the globe and discover experiences suited to all levels, from baptism to technical diving.
whyUs.memorableDesc: Live unique moments, enrich your knowledge and share your passion with a community of divers and unforgettable discoveries.

homepage.ctaSubtitle: Discover the most beautiful dive sites in the world and book easily with certified centers.

about.heroTitle: Born from a passion for the depths
about.heroSubtitle: EviDive was born from a simple dream: making the underwater world accessible to everyone, safely, anywhere on the planet.
about.storyP1: It all started with a deep love for the ocean. That unique feeling of diving into the blue, breathing underwater, locking eyes with a sea turtle, or gliding along a colourful reef. We wanted everyone to experience this magic.
about.storyP2: But finding the right dive centre, comparing offers, booking with confidence… it wasn't easy. So we created EviDive: a platform connecting enthusiasts with certified dive centres, selected for their professionalism, passion, and respect for the marine environment.
about.missionTitle: Making diving accessible, safe, and unforgettable
about.missionDesc: We believe diving should never be left to chance. Our mission: simplify booking, guarantee safety, and offer every diver — from the curious beginner to the seasoned expert — a transformative experience.
about.valueSafetyDesc: Every partner centre is verified against strict criteria: recognised certifications, compliant equipment, professional supervision, and rigorous safety protocols.
about.valueOceanDesc: We select centres committed to preserving marine ecosystems. Diving is also about protecting this fragile world we love to explore.
about.valueCommunityDesc: EviDive is much more than a booking platform. It's a community of enthusiasts sharing their favourite spots, tips, and most beautiful dives.
about.valueAccessibilityDesc: From introductory dives to technical expeditions, from Mediterranean waters to tropical reefs: every diver finds their next adventure with us.
about.communityDesc: Our vision: making diving an inner and outer journey — connected, ethical, and unforgettable. Join enthusiasts from around the world and share the magic of the depths.

centers.reviewDesc: Share your experience and help the community of enthusiasts in search of the best dive spots.
centers.subscribeFreeDesc: Create your profile for free and start receiving bookings. No registration or subscription fees.
centers.visibilityDesc: Get known to divers worldwide. Showcase your services and attract new clients for your dive site.
centers.directBookingDesc: Receive and manage your bookings without intermediaries. Keep direct contact with your clients.
centers.clientReviewsDesc: Build your reputation through verified reviews. Interact with your clients and showcase your expertise.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of the EviDive platform.
terms.section1: By accessing or using EviDive, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
terms.section2: EviDive provides a platform connecting dive enthusiasts with certified dive centers. We facilitate bookings but are not the provider of dive activities.
terms.section3: You must provide accurate information when creating an account. You are responsible for keeping your credentials secure.
terms.section4: Bookings are subject to the dive center's cancellation policy. EviDive acts as an intermediary; payment terms are defined by each center.
terms.section5: EviDive is not liable for accidents, injuries or damages occurring during dive activities. Dive centers are solely responsible for their services.
terms.section6: We may update these terms. Continued use constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1: We collect information you provide (name, email, booking details) and usage data to improve our services.
privacy.section2: Your data is used to process bookings, send confirmations, improve the platform and communicate with you.
privacy.section3: We share booking details with dive centers to fulfill your reservations. We do not sell your data to third parties.
privacy.section4: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information.
privacy.section5: You can request access, correction or deletion of your data by contacting us.
privacy.section6: We use cookies for session management and analytics. You can disable them in your browser settings.

blog.pageDescription: Tips, destinations, and advice for divers of all levels.

faq.pageDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about EviDive and scuba diving.
faq.q1_answer: EviDive is an online platform that lets you discover, compare, and book scuba diving experiences at certified dive centres around the world.
faq.q2_question: Do I need to be certified to dive?
faq.q2_answer: Not necessarily. Many centres offer introductory dives (baptêmes) for beginners with no certification. For autonomous dives, a recognised certification (PADI, SSI, CMAS, etc.) is required.
faq.q3_question: Can I see which marine species I might encounter?
faq.q3_answer: Yes! Many centres list the species commonly seen at their sites. You can search for dives where you might see turtles, sharks, dolphins, manta rays, and more.
faq.q4_answer: When a centre offers activities for children, this information is clearly shown in their listing. You can also filter your search accordingly.
faq.q5_question: Are dives accessible to people with reduced mobility?
faq.q5_answer: Some partner dive centres are equipped to welcome people with reduced mobility. This information is specified on their profile. Feel free to contact the centre for details.
faq.q6_question: Can I book group dives or for a dive club?
faq.q6_answer: Yes, EviDive allows bookings for groups or clubs. Some centres even offer preferential rates. We recommend contacting the centre in advance to organise logistics.
faq.q7_answer: The platform accepts major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, etc.) as well as other secure methods like PayPal. All payments are encrypted and secure.
faq.q8_answer: Some partner centres may offer instalment payments. This option is visible at checkout when available.
faq.q9_answer: Cancellation policies vary by centre. The specific conditions are clearly stated on each listing before you confirm your booking.
faq.q10_answer: Yes, you will receive an instant email confirmation with all details of your booking, including date, time, meeting point, and what to bring.
faq.q11_answer: Several partner centres offer packages including accommodation. You can filter results by this option or check combined offers on their page.
faq.q12_question: How does EviDive verify dive centres?
faq.q12_answer: All centres on EviDive must meet quality and safety criteria. We verify certifications, insurance, and equipment standards before listing any centre.
faq.q13_answer: Insurance coverage varies by centre and destination. We recommend checking the listing details and considering personal dive insurance for international travel.
faq.q14_answer: Instructors at our partner centres hold recognised certifications from organisations like PADI, SSI, CMAS, or equivalent bodies.
faq.q15_question: Can I dive in marine reserves?
faq.q15_answer: Yes, some centres offer dives in marine parks or reserves. These may require additional authorisation or fees, indicated in the listing.
faq.q16_question: Do I need my own equipment?
faq.q16_answer: Most centres provide full equipment rental. If you prefer using your own gear, you can check each listing for details on what is included.
faq.q17_answer: Yes, liveaboard trips are available in several destinations. These include accommodation on board, meals, and multiple dives per day.
faq.q18_question: Does the platform also offer freediving or snorkelling?
faq.q18_answer: Depending on the dive centre, freediving and snorkelling activities may also be available. Check each centre's offerings for details.
faq.q19_question: How do I choose the right dive centre abroad?
faq.q19_answer: Look for verified centres on EviDive with good reviews, certified instructors, and transparent pricing. Our platform makes it easy to compare options.
faq.q20_question: Can I leave a review after my dive?
faq.q20_answer: Absolutely! After your experience, you can rate and review the centre to help other divers make informed choices.

partner.pageDescription: Join the leading platform for dive centres and reach thousands of divers worldwide.
partner.heroTitle: Grow your dive centre with EviDive
partner.heroSubtitle: Join hundreds of dive centres worldwide. Get more visibility, simplify bookings, and connect with passionate divers from around the globe.
partner.benefit_visibility_desc: Your centre is showcased to thousands of divers searching for their next adventure. Gain exposure in over 30 languages.
partner.benefit_booking_desc: Our platform handles scheduling, availability, and confirmations. Less admin, more diving.
partner.benefit_payment_desc: Payments are processed securely. You receive your earnings reliably with transparent commission rates.
partner.benefit_community_desc: Connect with a global network of dive professionals and enthusiasts. Share experiences and grow together.
partner.step_register_desc: Sign up for free and provide your centre's details: name, location, certifications, and contact information.
partner.step_configure_desc: Add your diving experiences, prices, schedules, and photos. Customise your centre's profile page.
partner.step_publish_desc: Once approved, your centre becomes visible to divers worldwide. Start receiving booking requests immediately.
partner.step_receive_desc: Manage bookings through your dashboard, communicate with clients, and focus on delivering amazing experiences.
partner.ctaSubtitle: Registration is free. No commitment. Start reaching new divers today.
